channel.title: Getting Started on Juhong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Juhong's Blog

item.title: Prepare Your Site
item.description: Greeting! Thank you for deciding to use this theme. In this post, we are going to create a hugo site from scratch. Then, we will configure it with Toha theme, make it multilingual, add some example posts. At the end of this post, you should be able to run a fully functional hugo site with Toha theme locally. If you want a head start, you can just fork hugo-toha/hugo-toha.github.io repo, rename it and update with your own data.
